Title: Requires a course of study in the awareness and prevention of human trafficking
Summary: Requires a course of study in the awareness and prevention of human trafficking defined by the commissioner of education in regulations after consultation with the division of criminal justice services designed to educate students, parents and school personnel about the signs of human trafficking.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring a course of study in the awareness and prevention of human trafficking
